name: quantify_amyloid_beta_plaques
description: Quantifies amyloid-beta plaques in microscopy images using image segmentation and analysis.

setup_commands: git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/snap-stanford/Biomni.git /tmp/biomni && cd /tmp/biomni && pip install -e . && rm -rf .git

inputs.name: image_path
inputs.description: Path to the microscopy image file containing amyloid-beta plaques

inputs.name: min_plaque_size
inputs.description: Minimum plaque size in pixels to be counted

inputs.name: manual_threshold
inputs.description: Threshold value for manual thresholding (used only if threshold_method is 'manual')

output.description: Research log with plaque quantification results and statistics
